creditline: Gift of the Muschenheim family in memory of Linda A. Muschenheim, Docent, 1971-77
description: white-ground body with designs in rust red and brown; small concave base flaring outward to wide, flat shoulder; very short neck; wide mouth; decorated with geometric band around mouth; body decorated with two large medallions on opposite sides flanked by groups of four horizontal organic motifs with a band of three stylized birds between rows
title: Storage vessel
